ns0:g.ns0:text: â†’ Output feature map (3Ã—3 with stride=1)
1. Parameter Sharing: Same filter used across entire image â†’ Far fewer parameters than fully connected
2. Translation Invariance: Detects features regardless of position â†’ Robust to shifts
3. Hierarchical Features: Early layers: edges â†’ Middle: patterns â†’ Deep: complex objects
4. Local Connectivity: Each neuron only looks at small region â†’ Computationally efficient
